statements: UPDATE sculptures_feedback SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Amazing sculpture' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE sculptures_feedback SET rating = 5, date_reviewed = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures_feedback SET review_text = 'The sculpture is beautifully crafted.', rating = 4, reviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sculpture_id = 2;
UPDATE feedbacks SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Great sculpture!', created_at = '2021-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures SET description = 'Modern abstract sculpture made of metal', artist_name = 'John Doe', year_created = 2019 WHERE sculpture_id = 3;
UPDATE feedbacks SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Amazing sculpture!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures SET artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci', year_created = 1503 WHERE sculpture_id = 5;
UPDATE Sculptures SET sculpture_name = 'The Thinker', artist_name = 'Auguste Rodin' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE Reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Amazing sculpture! Must see!', review_date = '2023-05-12 08:30:00' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE Sculptures SET sculpture_name = 'Statue of Liberty', artist_name = 'Frederic Auguste Bartholdi' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE Reviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Beautiful sculpture with intricate details' WHERE reviewer_name = 'ArtLover' AND sculpture_id = 3;
UPDATE sculptures SET year_created = 2000, description = 'Modern sculpture by a famous artist' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE acquisitions SET cost = 5000.00, current_location = 'Museum A' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE sculptures SET year_created = 1995, description = 'A beautiful sculpture depicting nature' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE acquisitions SET acquisition_date = '2022-05-15', cost = 5000.00, current_location = 'Art Gallery B' WHERE sculpture_id = 3;
UPDATE SculptureReviews SET review_text = 'Amazing sculpture, highly recommended!' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureInfo SET acquisition_date = '2022-09-15', artist_name = 'Pablo Picasso' WHERE sculpture_id = 3;
UPDATE SculptureInfo SET sculpture_name = 'Updated Sculpture Name', artist_name = 'New Artist' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great sculpture, highly recommend!', rating = 5, feedback_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
